title: Marmite Steak Casserole
directions: Spread yeast extract on both sides of each rump steak; sprinkle brown sugar on top.
Place steaks in a slow cooker with onion, carrot, and celery.
Cook on Low until steaks are tender, 7 to 8 hours.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons yeast extract spread (such as Marmite)
